definition: a sudden appearance of an overwhelming number of things, to gather into a huge mass and roll down a mountain, of snow
details:
noun
- a sudden appearance of an overwhelming number of things
= example: a sudden appearance of an overwhelming number of things
- a slide of large masses of snow and ice and mud down a mountain
verb
- to gather into a huge mass and roll down a mountain, of snow
= example: to gather into a huge mass and roll down a mountain, of snow
= synonyms: roll down
